cards.name: Lathril, Blade of the Elves
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever Lathril, Blade of the Elves deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.
{T}, Tap ten untapped Elves you control: Each opponent loses 10 life and you gain 10 life.

cards.name: Ranar the Ever-Watchful
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
The first card you foretell each turn costs {0} to foretell.
Whenever you exile one or more cards from your hand and/or permanents from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Cosmic Intervention
cards.text:
If a permanent you control would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield this turn, exile it instead. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Foretell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

cards.name: Hero of Bretagard
cards.text:
Whenever you exile one or more cards from your hand and/or permanents from the battlefield, put that many +1/+1 counters on Hero of Bretagard.
As long as Hero of Bretagard has five or more counters on it, it has flying and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
As long as Hero of Bretagard has ten or more counters on it, it has indestructible and is a God in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Stoic Farmer
cards.text:
When Stoic Farmer enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Plains card and reveal it. If an opponent controls more lands than you, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Foretell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

cards.name: Sage of the Beyond
cards.text:
Flying
Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less to cast.
Foretell {4}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

cards.name: Spectral Deluge
cards.text:
Return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.
Foretell {1}{U}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

cards.name: Tales of the Ancestors
cards.text:
Each player with fewer cards in hand than the player with the most cards in hand draws cards equal to the difference.
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

cards.name: Pact of the Serpent
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of creatures they control of the chosen type.
cards.flavor: "Our quarrels are behind us. Our foes before us. Death or triumph for us all!"

cards.name: Ruthless Winnower
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Elf creature.
cards.flavor: "I count the usurpers with my dagger, one death blow at a time."

cards.name: Serpent's Soul-Jar
cards.text:
Whenever an Elf you control dies, exile it.
{T}, Pay 2 life: Until end of turn, you may cast a creature spell from among cards exiled with Serpent's Soul-Jar.
cards.flavor: The coils spiral like time itself, carrying spirits back around from death to reawakening.

cards.name: Bounty of Skemfar
cards.text: Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and an Elf card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
cards.flavor: Even war cannot dull Skemfar's beauty.

cards.name: Crown of Skemfar
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Elf you control and has reach.
{2}{G}: Return Crown of Skemfar from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Lathril, queen of the ancient Eimir, left a powerful legacy for her mortal descendants.

cards.name: Wolverine Riders
cards.text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.
cards.flavor: "We'll break their lines. The rest of you, follow!"

cards.name: Elderfang Venom
cards.text:
Attacking Elves you control have deathtouch.
Whenever an Elf you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: "The Cosmos Serpent favored us with his venom. As thanks, we sink fangs into those who dishonor the old ways."

cards.name: Ethereal Valkyrie
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Ethereal Valkyrie enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. It becomes foretold. Its foretell cost is its mana cost reduced by {2}. (On a later turn, you may cast it for its foretell cost, even if this creature has left the battlefield.)

cards.name: Angel of Finality
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Finality enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
cards.flavor: "Better the dead depart utterly than be enslaved."

cards.name: Angel of Serenity
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Banishing Light
cards.text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
The Champion reached for a stone, and Heliod placed the sun into her hand.
-The Theriad

cards.name: Cleansing Nova
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
cards.flavor: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.

cards.name: Cloudgoat Ranger
cards.text:
When Cloudgoat Ranger enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens.
Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: Cloudgoat Ranger gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Eerie Interlude
cards.text: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: The barrier between existence and oblivion is thinner than you know.

cards.name: Evangel of Heliod
cards.text: When Evangel of Heliod enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

cards.name: Flickerwisp
cards.text:
Flying
When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: Its wings disturb more than air.

cards.name: Geist-Honored Monk
cards.text:
Vigilance
Geist-Honored Monk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
When Geist-Honored Monk enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

cards.name: Ghostly Prison
cards.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
cards.flavor: Thought the spirits' bodies were ethereal, Agnur soon learned that their blades were quite solid-and razor-sharp.

cards.name: Goldnight Commander
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "One faith, but many hands in victory."

cards.name: Kor Cartographer
cards.text: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.

cards.name: Marshal's Anthem
cards.text:
Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Marshal's Anthem enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times Marshal's Anthem was kicked.

cards.name: Momentary Blink
cards.text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Restoration Angel
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Return to Dust
cards.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.

cards.name: Storm Herd
cards.text: Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.
cards.flavor:
"When you hear thunder on a cloudless day, take cover and brace for the coming of the storm herd."
-Skotov, Tin Street basket vendor

cards.name: Sun Titan
cards.text:
Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: A blazing sun that never sets.

cards.name: Wall of Omens
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."
-Expedition journal entry

cards.name: Arcane Artisan
cards.text:
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card.
When Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Curse of the Swine
cards.text: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.
cards.flavor: Another imminent battle subsided in busy snuffling and carefree rooting.

cards.name: Day of the Dragons
cards.text:
When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then create that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.
When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Ghostly Flicker
cards.text: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.

cards.name: Inspired Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
When Inspired Sphinx enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have.
{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

cards.name: Mist Raven
cards.text:
Flying
When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."
-Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Sea Gate Oracle
cards.text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
cards.flavor: "The secret entrance should be near."

cards.name: Synthetic Destiny
cards.text: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.
cards.flavor: To Jin-Gitaxias, perfection is not a goal, but a process.

cards.name: Whirler Rogue
cards.text:
When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Windfall
cards.text: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
cards.flavor: "Rich" is a relative term.

cards.name: Ambition's Cost
cards.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
-Ob Nixilis

cards.name: Eyeblight Cullers
cards.text: When Eyeblight Cullers dies, create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens, then mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor:
"As long as eyeblights exist, the hunt will never end."
-Miara, Thorn of the Glade

cards.name: Eyeblight Massacre
cards.text: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I've already seen so much evil, so much darkness. Why do you insist on adding more?"
-Nissa Revane, to Dwynen

cards.name: Lys Alana Scarblade
cards.text: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.
cards.flavor: In beauty-obsessed Lys Alana, one cut of her blade means the difference between a high society feast and raking through the dungheap for scraps.

cards.name: Miara, Thorn of the Glade
cards.text:
Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
cards.flavor: "Approach from downwind. Tread with care. Aim for the heart."

cards.name: Pride of the Perfect
cards.text: Elves you control get +2/+0.
cards.flavor: Like moonglove's flowers, the greatest beauty often masks the greatest dangers.

cards.name: Prowess of the Fair
cards.text: Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
cards.flavor: An elvish duel is a thing of beauty: the warriors' grace, the crash of steel, then the artful spray of blood.

cards.name: Beast Whisperer
cards.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "The tiniest mouse speaks louder to me than all the festival crowds on Tin Street."

cards.name: Cultivator of Blades
cards.text:
Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)
Whenever Cultivator of Blades attacks, you may have other attacking creatures get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Cultivator of Blades's power.

cards.name: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
cards.text:
Reach
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.
cards.flavor: "This is our land. We will not allow eyeblights to poison its beauty."

cards.name: Elvish Archdruid
cards.text:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.
cards.flavor: "The elves tend the forest, and the forest sustains the elves. My role is to ensure that the cycle continues."

cards.name: Elvish Mystic
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}.
cards.flavor:
"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."
-Nissa Revane

cards.name: Elvish Promenade
cards.text: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.
cards.flavor: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

cards.name: Elvish Rejuvenator
cards.text: When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: End-Raze Forerunners
cards.text:
Vigilance, trample, haste
When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Smash this city to pieces."
-Domri Rade

cards.name: Farhaven Elf
cards.text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."

cards.name: Harvest Season
cards.text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, and put those cards onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: A true reflection of nature: death fostering life.

cards.name: Imperious Perfect
cards.text:
Other Elves you control get +1/+1.
{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
cards.flavor: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

cards.name: Jagged-Scar Archers
cards.text:
Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control.
{T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

cards.name: Llanowar Tribe
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.
cards.flavor: "Llanowar remembers the Ice Age, the Phyrexian Invasion, and the Rift Era. So long as we draw breath, we will ensure such disasters never threaten our world again."

cards.name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
cards.text: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
cards.flavor: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

cards.name: Marwyn, the Nurturer
cards.text:
Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Marwyn, the Nurturer.
{T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to Marwyn's power.
cards.flavor: Midwife to mothers and leader to all.

cards.name: Masked Admirers
cards.text:
When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."

cards.name: Nullmage Shepherd
cards.text: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: The Skelle spent days carving runes and erecting their scorn poles. The herd crushed them to splinters in seconds.

cards.name: Numa, Joraga Chieftain
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {X}{X}. When you do, distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target Elves.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
cards.flavor: His blade carves a path for his people. His words guide them along it.

cards.name: Reclamation Sage
cards.text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

cards.name: Rhys the Exiled
cards.text:
Whenever Rhys the Exiled attacks, you gain 1 life for each Elf you control.
{B}, Sacrifice an Elf: Regenerate Rhys the Exiled.
cards.flavor: Once a famed hunter and packmaster, now a renegade seeking his own path.

cards.name: Springbloom Druid
cards.text: When Springbloom Druid enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "New growth applies a healing poultice to wounds long scabbed over."

cards.name: Sylvan Messenger
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Timberwatch Elf
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "If you ever want to leave this forest, now's the time."

cards.name: Voice of Many
cards.text: When Voice of Many enters the battlefield, draw a card for each opponent who controls fewer creatures than you.
cards.flavor: His words echo every roar, screech, and howl of the wilds.

cards.name: Voice of the Woods
cards.text: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Create a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample.
cards.flavor: "Ancient ones, I call on you, your wisdom and your power, your will to claim again all that is rightfully yours."

cards.name: Wirewood Channeler
cards.text: {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Your words are meaningless. The rustling of leaves is the only language that makes any sense."

cards.name: Wood Elves
cards.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

cards.name: Abomination of Llanowar
cards.text:
Vigilance; menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Abomination of Llanowar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control plus the number of Elf cards in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: "Run!" screamed its living mouths. "Come!" cried its dead ones.

cards.name: Brago, King Eternal
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.
cards.flavor: "My rule persists beyond death itself."

cards.name: Casualties of War
cards.text:
Choose one or more -
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target land.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

cards.name: Cloudblazer
cards.text:
Flying
When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.
cards.flavor: All the aether charts in the world can't compete with the trained eye of a talented scout.

cards.name: Empyrean Eagle
cards.text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: All the birds of the skies are the spirit's brood, gathered for safety under its wings.

cards.name: Golgari Findbroker
cards.text: When Golgari Findbroker enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "We gather the past from surface dwellers and sell it right back to them."

cards.name: Migratory Route
cards.text:
Create four 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.
Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Mistmeadow Witch
cards.text: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.

cards.name: Moldervine Reclamation
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The heroes of the past nourish our spirits by their example-and nourish our crops by their decay."
-Jeddeg, philosopher of graves

cards.name: Poison-Tip Archer
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Whenever another creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

cards.name: Putrefy
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."
-Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

cards.name: Shaman of the Pack
cards.text: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.
cards.flavor: To the elves, her spear is a compass; to the boggarts, a harbinger of doom.

cards.name: Soulherder
cards.text:
Whenever a creature is exiled from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulherder.
At the beginning of your end step, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
cards.flavor: It watches over every absence.

cards.name: Thunderclap Wyvern
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Thunder doesn't always mean rain. Sometimes it means ruin.

cards.name: Twinblade Assassins
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Rumors swirl of a pair of deadly Golgari assassins only known as the Left and Right Hands of Ochran.

cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

cards.name: Azorius Signet
cards.flavor: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law-strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

cards.name: Burnished Hart
cards.text: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.

cards.name: Commander's Sphere
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

cards.name: Marble Diamond
cards.text:
Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
cards.flavor: The essence of sunlight to brighten the way.

cards.name: Meteor Golem
cards.text: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
cards.flavor: The impact sent the soldiers scattering-then something came out of the crater.

cards.name: Mind Stone
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?"
-Jhoira, master artificer

cards.name: Sky Diamond
cards.text:
Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
cards.flavor: The essence of wind to lift up the weary.

cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
cards.flavor: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

cards.name: Swiftfoot Boots
cards.text:
Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.
Equip {1}
cards.flavor:
"There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat . . . if you're prepared."
-Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

cards.name: Azorius Chancery
cards.text:
Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped.
When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}{U}.

cards.name: Azorius Guildgate
cards.text:
Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
cards.flavor: The Azorius symbol stares down like a great eye, reminding visitors of the watchful presence of Isperia and her lawmages.

cards.name: Command Tower
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor:
"Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind."
-Gadwick, the Wizened

cards.name: Cryptic Caves
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Cryptic Caves: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.
cards.flavor: Only when you've given up the search will the caves yield their secrets.

cards.name: Foul Orchard
cards.text:
Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: The stench of rotting meat lures flies, goblins, and young raptors.

cards.name: Golgari Guildgate
cards.text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
cards.flavor: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.

cards.name: Golgari Rot Farm
cards.text:
Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped.
When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}{G}.

cards.name: Jungle Hollow
cards.text:
Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

cards.name: Meandering River
cards.text:
Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
cards.flavor: The river split into many channels as it flowed to the Halimar Sea. Few travelers could follow the same one twice.

cards.name: Myriad Landscape
cards.text:
Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Opal Palace
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

cards.name: Path of Ancestry
cards.text:
Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
